text: K.L. 7/95 Ernakulam North is a 1996 Indian Malayalam film directed by Paulson and starring Shammi Thilakan, Anusha and Idavela Babu in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Shammi Thilakan as Prakashan * Anusha as Radha * Idavela Babu as Babu * Janardhanan as Sadanantha Pai *Baburaj as A.Z Stanly * Mahesh as Jackson *K. R. Vatsala as Sherly * Nandhu as Unni *Mala Aravindan as Sankarankutty Ashan *Shaju as Issac *Kottayam Nazeer as Salim *Jagathy Sreekumar as Union leader Karthikeyan *Priyanka as Seetha *Manju Satheesh as Sudha *Thilakan as himself *Sainuddin as Augustin *Mamukkoya as Backker *Machan Varghese as Eliyas ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: K. L. 7/95 Ernakulam North
